data.text: Previously our people were like [MET] pure gold,
The young men of Jerusalem were as valuable as [MET] large amounts of gold,
Even the female jackals/wolves feed their pups,
My people’s infants’ tongues cling to the roofs/tops of their mouths
People who previously ate fine food
The people of Sodom were struck with a disaster very suddenly,
Our leaders’ behavior was previously very pure,
But now their faces are blacker than soot,
It is better to die in a battle [MTY]
Women who usually/previously were very kind
Yahweh has shown that he was extremely angry;
None of the kings on the earth or anyone else
But that is what happened;
The prophets and priests wandered through the streets
The people who were alive shouted, “Stay away from us [DOU]! You are defiled/untouchable!
It is Yahweh himself who has scattered them;
We [SYN] continued to look for someone to help us,
Our enemies were hunting for us,
Those who pursued us were faster than eagles flying in the sky.
Our king, whom Yahweh appointed,
You people of [IDM] Edom and Uz,
You people of [APO] Jerusalem,
